body:
XML-IO-SERVER library for I/O management of climate models.

XIOS implements I/O functionality required by climate models, including creation and post-processing of output diagnostic and history files. I/O operations are defined in XML files, so that definitions can be changed without recompiling code. Scalable performance is achieved using asynchronous I/O from multiple server processes writing to NetCDF4 format in parallel.
title: xios: I/O management for climate models
